_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: AtlBot
author: jfeldt19@gmail.com
description: ATLbot in pterodactyl, this is based off https://github.com/ATLauncher/discord-bot made by RyantheAllmighty

installation.script:
apt-get update
apt-get install -y unzip
mkdir /app
cd /app
wget https://github.com/ATLauncher/discord-bot/archive/master.zip
unzip master.zip
rm /app/master.zip
cd /app/discord-bot-master/
/usr/local/bin/npm install --production
/usr/local/bin/npm run build
cp -r /app/discord-bot-master/. /mnt/server
